title.narrative: Support for the African Development Bank's "Multi-donor Trust Fund for Transition" (AfDB)

description.narrative:
The purpose of the fund is to support countries in transition by assigning AfDB with fast and flexible tools to meet the needs of the member countries in the region undergoing deep institutional changes.
The fund is established in the context of the rapid development in the North African countries to support the initiated reforms and institutional processes of change.
The target groups of the fund are public institutions, civil society groups including NGOs and business organisations as well as deprtments within AfDB working with I) strengthened governance, II) economic and social inclusion, III) job creation, IV) private sector led economic Growth, and V) increased global and regional integration.
Of special concern for Danish participation is the support for job creation, including the co-funding of the "Souk At-tanmia project", which is a partnership platform designed to attract and support the implementation of innovative projects from young entrepreneurs from and non-profit civil society organisations among others.
